summary: Comprehensive testing of Star Trade website completed successfully. All major functionality working including landing page, authentication, admin dashboard, and CRUD operations.

minor_issues.issue: Returns HTTP 200 instead of 201 for POST operations
minor_issues.impact: Minor - functionality works but doesn't follow REST conventions

session_management.issue: JWT tokens expire relatively quickly requiring re-authentication
session_management.impact: User experience - users need to login frequently

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero video section
Navigation menu scrolls to sections correctly
Differentials section shows 3 cards
Areas section shows 4+ areas with 'NOSSA ESPECIALIDADE' badge on Rochas Ornamentais
Contact form submission works (POST /api/contact)
WhatsApp floating button visible and functional
User registration (POST /api/auth/register)
User login (POST /api/auth/login)
Dashboard access after login with stats and recent messages
Areas CRUD operations (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE /api/areas)
Blog CRUD operations (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE /api/blog)
Messages listing in admin (GET /api/messages)
Settings update (GET, PUT /api/settings)
All backend API endpoints return correct data
Frontend-backend integration working properly
Admin dashboard displays correct statistics
Contact form integrates with backend API
Blog post creation and editing functionality
Settings management with live updates
Responsive design elements working
